Author: edw519
Content:
In addition to everything else, this is great marketing!

Don't understand our concept? Look at what others have done with it.

Chances are you will find something there that will strike a nerve.

Author: sosuke
Content: I like the idea of banning sites from my personal search results but I think if they turn it into a social setting (reddit, digg) it will have a lot of potential to be a really bad idea.

Author: koolmoe
Content: Hmmm...cutting your own hair to save time.  This, I like.  But how do they do it?  Flowbee? Clippers?

Author: electric
Content: It doesn't matter whether they do or don't. The problem with GPS receivers is that they do not work reliably indoors. If Loopt relies entirely on GPS to locate users then this offering from Google is superior.

Content: Consider adding some fancy ?ref= params, too.

Author: dannyv
Content:
ConnectU used to look like junk back in August 2007: http://web.archive.org/web/20070826023826/http://www.connect...

Now, it's REALLY similar to Facebook once you look around the inside. It's pretty ridiculous, because it seems that ConnectU was recently updated to appear just like Facebook to make their case stronger ?!

Author: agentbleu
Title: Who will make it into Hell first, PayPerPost or TextLinkAds?
Content: Both of these models have falling out of favor with God. With no PR left to trade, paid link revenue no longer adds up and evidently sellers are looking elsewhere for revenue, while persistent link buyers are moving onto pastures new! So where does this ultimately leave TLA and PPP?
